= [ModelQuery ModelQuery] =

ModelQuery is a easy-to-use database API.  Key features include data validation, model caching, lazy loading related models, and a flexible chaining filter API that makes data manipulation in PHP quick and error-free.

= [PHPApp PHPApp] =

PHPApp is a web application framework for PHP and MySQL. It uses ModelQuery for data access, and provides shared application services and a powerful administration site builder.
